name: Honedge
description: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.effect: Moves used by or against this Pokémon never miss.  One-hit KO moves are unaffected.  Moves affected by this ability can hit Pokémon during the preparation turn of moves like dig or fly.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.
abilities.description: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe's attacks land.
